comments.body: Would suggest cutting down on the extra spacing. Following the order `number`, `script`, `entry_points` should help.
OK,  should be correctly formatted now.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@  entry_points:
    - px42csv=px4tools.px42csv:main
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:

comments.body: I'm really confused by this. Tags v0.3.7...v0.4.5 are all released on the same day. Also only v0.3.5 is on PyPI, but not of these later tags. Could we please ping the author and ask him to put sdists for these other tags on PyPI?

@jakirkham I'm the author too, I just kept incrementing the build tags as I fixed issues related to conda forge packaging. I thought it was better than the alternative of overwriting tags. If you know a better way, let me know. I just uploaded the sdist to pypi.
